SELECT IFNULL(MAX(sCode),0) + 1 AS sCode FROM starTable
INSERT INTO starTable(sCode, mCode, uid, star, comment, wdate) VALUES(#{sCode}, #{mCode}, #{uid}, #{star}, #{comment}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT sCode, mCode, uid, comment, wdate, star FROM starTable WHERE mCode=#{mCode } ORDER BY sCode DESC
SELECT (select avg(star) from starTable WHERE mCode=#{mCode}) AS avgstar FROM starTable WHERE mCode=#{mCode} GROUP BY mCode
select genre as wdate, avg(star) as star, uid from movieTable mt join starTable st ON mt.mCode = st.mCode WHERE uid=#{uid} group by genre
